pages.text: There are two variants of Fluid Splitter: The Basic Fluid Splitter and Redstone Fluid Splitter. Both accept fluid from the sides & output it to the top and bottom. The Basic Fluid Splitter will output 1/2 of the inserted fluids to the top and 1/2 to the bottom. The Redstone Fluid Splitter splits fluids based on a redstone signal. (Signal Strength)/15 of the fluid goes to the bottom, and the rest goes out the top.
A rule of thumb to remember which way redstone redirects fluid is that if you were to place a lever on a Redstone Fluid Splitter, the fluid would exit in the direction the lever points.
